titleStmt.title: An Abstract of severall letters from Hull, York, and Beverly of His Majesties proceedings as also the carriage and behaviour of the Cavaliers, with the number of those that were slain and taken prisoners by Sir John Hotham : whereunto is added a true relation of the provision in Hull.

notesStmt.note: Title on added t.p.: A true relation of the proceedings from York and Beverley shewing the great power and strength there raised against the Parliament and Hull. London : Printed for Iohn Iohnson, Aug. 3, 1642.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
